conversation.content: I want comfortable, durable clothing that offers good value for money and can be worn casually on a daily basis. within my expected price range: [13.49, 16.0]

Based on your budget range and preferences, I recommend the Dockers Men's Classic Fit Easy Khaki Pants. They are priced at $34.99 and offer great comfort and durability for daily wear. If you decide to purchase these pants, I also suggest considering the potentially purchasable candidate: <Dockers Men's Classic Fit Easy Khaki Pants (Regular and Big & Tall) (B0C617DXTK)>.
